string-array.item: Seoul Nat. Uni entrance Bus Stop
Bus Stop in front of main Gate

string-array.name: SNU_desc_array
string-array.item: Take this bus 6003 to travel to and from Incheon international airport.
line 2. exit 4. You can find the bus stop and take the bus 02
line 2. exit 3. You can find the bus stop and take the bus 5511, 5512, 5513
You can take the shuttle bus in campus or other local bus.
Take this bus 6017 to travel to and from Incheon international airport
Take this bus 6017 to travel to and from Incheon international airport.
